title: "Miscellaneous"
---

- For more information about simple R Markdown websites, please read the documentation at https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/rmarkdown-site.html.  

- Use `rmarkdown:::site_skeleton(getwd())` in the console, along with `rmarkdown::render_site()` as needed.  

- The code for the navigation bar comes from https://github.com/rstudio/rmarkdown-website/blob/master/_navbar.html (accessed April 2025).
